dcterms:creator: A. Ray
J. Achiam
D. Amodei
dcterms:description: A configurable suite of robotic navigation tasks that require continuous, multidimensional control, containing multiple types of robots that must navigate around obstacles with different dynamics to perform various tasks.
dcterms:title: OpenAI Safety Gym

dcterms:creator: J. Achiam
dcterms:description: A set of environments designed for testing reinforcement learning algorithms, particularly in continuous action spaces, focusing on various tasks and challenges.
dcterms:title: MuJoCo environments

dcterms:creator: T. Yu
D. Quillen
Z. He
dcterms:description: A benchmark and evaluation suite for multi-task and meta reinforcement learning, consisting of a variety of manipulation tasks for robotic arms.
dcterms:title: Meta-World MT10 benchmark
